name: Black Sheep, Read & Play
description:
A sheep never has to be cold, because its wool is very soft and warm. But it takes a lot of work to make two young children just as warm and cozy in the winter. The sheep need to be fed with fresh grass and shaven when their wool is ready. The wool needs to be wound into yarn and then Grandma can knit the yarn into nice warm clothes. Now you can follow along with the story. Help take care of the sheep and dress the kids in nice warm clothes for winter time.

This app does not display third party ads, and does not collect personal data.
